Forging the way

for Healthy Coffee

Learn More

Welcome to Windy City Coffee

Based in the heart of Chicago, we're a startup focused on bringing healthy coffee products to customers across the world. With years of experience establishing relationships with coffee farmers, roasters, and manufacturers, we have perfected the supply chain management of building successful coffee brands.

What makes us different

Powered by TechnoRoasting™, our brands have the lowest acid, and the highest vitamin and mineral count compared to any coffee on the market. The FDA approved process results in an all-natural, nutrient boosted cup of delicious coffees.

Vitamin Rich

The highest vitamins and minerals in any coffee.

All Natural

The FDA approved roasting process results in a purely unadulterated coffee.

High Quality

We source only the finest Arabica coffee beans from Colombia.

Award Winning

We have been rated the number 1 Low Acid Swiss Water decaf in the U.S.

Our Partners

HealthWise Coffee

The original Low-Acid Coffee. A family owned company based out of the Chicago suburbs, HealthWise has paved the way for WindyCity Coffee's success.

Brim Coffee

A classic! Brim coffee was the number 1 coffee in the 60s, announcing it's comeback, WindyCity Coffee has partnered with Brim to reinvigorate this timeless brand.

TechnoRoasting™

The Secret Formula for our coffee. The sole reason we can produce such high quality coffee with so many health benefits.

Our Solutions

Distribution

We specialize in distributing and managing your coffee brand. Everything from E-commerce, and order fufillment. Ensuring your product grows from conception and on the shelves.

Roasting

The possibilities are endless for coffee choices. We can provide a multitude of cost effective and delicious roasts of coffees grown all across the globe.

Organic, Fair-Trade Coffees

We can produce the highest quality coffees available. Our specialty brand, HealthWise, is one of the highest quality coffees available, truley 100% Arabic Colombian Supremo.

Private Labeling

We help you every step of the way in development of your coffee brand. You provide the idea, we provide the coffee.

Who We Are

With years of experience growing HealthWise, we have branched off into WindyCity Coffee with a goal of expanding our line of coffee products. Our goal is to bring the power of TechnoRoasting™ to the shelves of consumers.

Jimmy Couch

Founder
